lead_paragraph: Irish Majesty edged Pink Viper by a nose yesterday in the $56,840 opening-day feature at Aqueduct.With Mike Luzzi aboard, Irish Majesty launched a three-wide rally that carried him to his fifth win in 25 starts. Irish Majesty, ran the mile on the fast track in 1 minute 37.40 seconds, and paid $18.60 on a $2 bet to win.
